it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.controller

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.controller.GameLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    All the operation necessary to the Game This class represent also the most part of the Controller
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playerIDList,
                 ServerView view)
          throws NotEnoughPlayersException,
                 GameLogicError,
                 java.io.IOException
        Constructor of the GameLogic called by the ServerView when a match starts
        Parameters:
        playerIDList - The list of the player in this game
        view - The Server view used to implements the MVC in the Server
        Throws:
        NotEnoughPlayersException - Exception thrown when there isn't enough player in this match, it means that there is a big error in the code
        GameLogicError - Exception thrown when a fatal error occured in GameLogic
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown when there is an Input/Output Exception, such as in reading File or in reading/writing socket

    • Method Detail

      • searchPlayer

        public Player searchPlayer(java.lang.String playerID)
                    throws ElementNotFoundException
        Private method used when GameLogic need to search the player
        Parameters:
        playerID - the player ID String
        Returns:
        Player the player whose playerID is equal to the passed playerID
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - Fatal error, thrown if there isn't the player in GameLogic with the passed playerID

      • searchInArrayList

        private Player searchInArrayList(java.lang.String playerID,
                                 java.util.List<Player> list)

      • constructTable

        private Table constructTable(java.util.List<Player> players)
                      throws NotEnoughPlayersException
        Method used to load the correct Table given the number of players
        Parameters:
        players - The players used to construct the correct kind of table
        Returns:
        Table The correct table for the match
        Throws:
        NotEnoughPlayersException - In case of the game logic hasn't a correct number of players

      • isInitGame

        public boolean isInitGame()
        Method used to verify if the initialization phase is done
        Returns:
        true if the GameLogic is initializing the match, false if the GameLogic ends the initialization phase

        Private method used to shift the leader cards through the player

      • askLeaderCard

        Private method used to ask which leader card the players want At the end of this phase, start the match

      • setLeaderCard

        public void setLeaderCard(int choice,
                          java.lang.String playerID)
        Method called by the controller visitor to set the chosen leader card to the player
        Parameters:
        choice - Index of which card the player wants
        playerID - The player who chosen that card

      • startMatch

        private void startMatch()
        Simple method called to start a match Simply set the current round and start the round

      • initRound

        private void initRound()
        Method used to initialize the round It place cards on table, throw the dice, enable the leader cards and finally start the initialization of the action

      • checkOtherPlayerLeaderRequest

        private void checkOtherPlayerLeaderRequest(Player player)
        Private method used to check the players leader cards request, such as the color of the familiar player wants to increase
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check

      • handleLeaderFamiliarRequest

        public void handleLeaderFamiliarRequest(LeaderFamiliarRequest request)
        Method called by the visitor to handle the answer to a leader request
        Parameters:
        request - The message taken from the client

      • checkBan

        private void checkBan(Effect ban,
                      int faithPointToHave,
                      int period)
        Private method used to know if the player can afford a ban. In this case, ask directly to the player if he wants
        Parameters:
        ban - The ban to enable
        faithPointToHave - Faith point player must have to pay the ban
        period - The current period of activation

      • endMatch

        private void endMatch()
        Private method called at the end of the match to verify the last ban

      • calculateWinner

        private void calculateWinner()
        Method used to calculate correctly the player's victory points. This method calculate all the players' victory points and finally notify the winner

      • restartRound

        private void restartRound()
        Method called to restart a round. But first it takes the correct roundOrder from the table and populates both actionOrder and roundOrder arraylists

      • initAction

        public void initAction()
        Method used to init the action. This method is also called by the visitor when a player give an empty move. It asks to the player the PlayerMove. If all the players have done their actions, restart the round, but also control the ban if necessary

      • askMoveToPlayer

        private void askMoveToPlayer()

      • faithPathIncrease

        private void faithPathIncrease(Player player)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Method called to increase victory point when player uses his faith point
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose victory points are to increase
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there isn't the file in the specified path

      • handleBan

        public void handleBan(java.lang.String playerID,
                      int index,
                      boolean wantToPayBan)
        Method used to handle the answer after a ban request. Method called by the controller visitor
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player who answers
        index - The period of the ban
        wantToPayBan - Variable used to know if the player wants to pay or not

      • handleAction

        public void handleAction(Action action,
                         java.lang.String playerID)
        Method called by the visitor to handle a PlayerMove
        Parameters:
        action - The action created from the PlayerMove
        playerID - The player who is playing

      • checkRequest

        private void checkRequest()
        Private method used to check the requests If the player has requests, add the player to an arraylists. When the player finishes to answer, continue with the correct method: 1) if there is an action, then apply the doAction 2) if it's the sixth round, finish the match 3) else the match is finished, so calculate the winner

      • doAction

        private void doAction()
        Method used to finish the action applying the doAction method of Action After that, check some requests

      • finishAction

        private void finishAction()
        Method used to control if the player has some bonus action.

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(CardRequest request)
        Method called by the visitor when the current player answers to a card request
        Parameters:
        request - The request send to the player

      • handleCouncilRequest

        public void handleCouncilRequest(CouncilRequest councilRequest)
        Method called by the visitor when the current player answers to a council request
        Parameters:
        councilRequest - The request send to the player

      • getTable

        public Table getTable()
        Return the current table, used by the controller visitor to create the action
        Returns:
        The reference to the current table

      • getBonusActionValue

        public int getBonusActionValue()
        Used to create the correct action in controller visitor
        Returns:
        The value of the current bonus action, if there is one bonus action else 0

      • HandleLeaderUpdate

        public void HandleLeaderUpdate(Player searchPlayer,
                               LeaderCard card)
        Method called by the visitor when the current player wants to enable the leader card
        Parameters:
        searchPlayer - Player who answers to the request
        card - The card to enable

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()
        Returns:
        Reference to the current player

      • isThereAnAction

        public boolean isThereAnAction()
        Returns:
        True if there is an action incompleted, false in other cases

      • rollBackAction

        public void rollBackAction()
        Method used to rollback an action if there is a problem

        Returns:
        The current ROund

      • removePlayerFromPendingRequest

        public void removePlayerFromPendingRequest(Player player)
        Remove the player from the playersWithRequest list
        Parameters:
        player - The player to remove

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected(Player player)
        Control if the player is connected
        Parameters:
        player - The player to control
        Returns:
        True if he is connected, False if he isn't connected

      • cancelRequest

        public void cancelRequest(CancelCardRequest message)
        Method used to cancel a request, in this way the player doesn't enable the effect
        Parameters:
        message - The message arrived in GameLogic from the player

      • removeBonusAction

        public void removeBonusAction()
        Method used to remove the current bonus action, used in the timer when it expired

      • discardLeaderCard

        public void discardLeaderCard(java.lang.String playerID,
                              LeaderCard card)

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable arg0,
                   java.lang.Object arg1)
        Method used when a notify arrives to the controller. If the notify is a message, pass it to the visitor, else if the notify is a String, it means there is a disconnection or a reconnection of one player, so handle it
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
